item.title: That first post
item.description: So, I got the idea that I should start writing down whatever I do that may be of any help to others. Every now and then, I find myself in the situation of a technical problem that just doesn’t seem to have a solution indexed in any search engine or community, and I’ll have to solve it on my own. That is one example of what I will write about here.
